# draw(withExpansionFrame:in:)

**Instance Method**

Performs custom expansion tool tip drawing.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor func draw(withExpansionFrame contentFrame: NSRect, in view: NSView)
```

## Parameters

- **contentFrame**: The frame in which to draw.
- **view**: The view in which to draw.

## Discussion

Note that the view may be different from the original view in which the text appeared.

## Managing Expansion Tool Tips

- **allowsExpansionToolTips**: A Boolean value that indicates whether expansion tool tips are shown when the control is hovered over.
- **expansionFrame(withFrame:)**: The frame in which a tool tip can be displayed, if needed.
